summary: We have long expressed concern about the Veterans Health Administration’s ability to ensure that it has the staff to meet veterans' needs. This testimony is based on our 2017 report on its physician staffing challenges. We found VHA needed to: provide additional guidance on how to determine the staff size needed in some specialty areas. VHA reports this will be done by December. comprehensively evaluate...
title: Veterans Health Administration: Steps Taken to Improve Physician Staffing, Recruitment, and Retention, but Challenges Remain
